GSD.description:
ALSA: emu10k1: Fix out of bounds access in snd_emu10k1_pcm_channel_alloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.9 by commit 4204a01ffce97cae1d59edc5848f02be5b2b9178. For more details please see the references link.
